title: Correct an Error in a Patient Chart
description: An HIM specialist discovers a scanned document was accidentally filed in the wrong patient's chart.

tasks.description: Identify the incorrect document in the first patient's chart.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the document that needs to be moved.

tasks.description: Remove the document from the incorrect chart, noting the reason as 'Chart correction'.
Locate the correct patient's chart and upload the document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent files the document in the correct patient's record, resolving the error.
